name: kanba
tagline: A kanban-style project and task management tool for teams
description: Kanba is a kanban style project and task management application with multi user support. It lets teams organize boards, track work in progress and comment on tasks, offering a Trello like experience on self hosted infrastructure.

features.title: Kanban Board Management
features.description: Create and manage kanban boards with columns and cards

features.title: Task Cards
features.description: Track tasks with titles, descriptions, and statuses

features.title: Board Collaboration
features.description: Share boards with multiple users for collaborative work

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Authenticate users to access personal and shared boards

features.title: Activity Tracking
features.description: View recent changes and actions on boards
